item.title: Using Roslyn to analyze and rewrite code in a solution
item.description: I've written a lot about Roslyn in the context of Roslyn Analyzers and Source Generators. You can also use Roslyn as a library to analyze and generate code. For instance, you can create a console application that loads a solution, find patterns, and rewrite code. While Roslyn Analyzers are tied to a single project, you can use Roslyn as a library to analyze a whole solution. Let's create the consoleâ€¦
